QuestData.Title: Brute Strength
QuestData.Description: Gandling has brought his lieutenant, the Ravenian, with him. This lumbering brute is far more dangerous than any of the other Scourge you will find upon the battlefield... even the abominations.$b$bYou will find the Ravenian within a tower near the southern end of town. I recommend caution before fighting him, $n. He will not be a pushover.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Outside of Scholomance, the Ravenian is weakened... but still powerful.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will not rest until the Lich King's taint is lifted from Andorhal.
